welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ilchester, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to immerse yourselves in our local culture and discover the unique beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'BWI Free WiFi' from their device's network list.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tipton AAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Tipton AAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights and operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Glenn L Martin Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Glenn L Martin Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lee Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport is exclusively for private flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport for free.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for American Airlines and its regional partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi throughout the airport by connecting to the 'DCA Free Wi-Fi' network.
